entry.title: Hash functions and pseudo-random number generation

link.title: Hash functions and pseudo-random number generation

entry.summary: Here I show two small tests, one with generation of an initial set of random numbers, and another on `popcount()` speeds, implemented in the low-level phylogenetic library biomcmc-lib.

entry.title: kalign3 as a library and colour printing

link.title: kalign3 as a library and colour printing

entry.summary: How the multiple sequence alignment kalign3 is implemented in the low-level phylogenetic library biomcmc-lib, and how to use colours in C.

entry.title: Minimal example of a rolling hash

link.title: Minimal example of a rolling hash

entry.summary: Description of a current implementation of a rolling hash in the low-level phylogenetic library biomcmc-lib

entry.title: Quantile functions implemented in biomcmc-lib
entry.summary: Description of how quantile finding is implemented in the low-level phylogenetic library biomcmc-lib

entry.title: K-mer in biomcmc-lib
entry.summary: This notebook contains a few details of how kmers are implemented in the low-level phylogenetic library biomcmc-lib.
